title: Client Extranet Software
content:
I realize this might be a far stretch for this forum, but where else do I have to turn?

I am looking for some suggestions for a Client Extranet Software. This would need to be PHP based with MySQL database conncetions. Run on Apache.

It's purpose would be for client proofing/approval/communication.

I am trying to find some suggestions, as we re-structure our online proofing.
author: Hildebrant

comments.content:
Its not a client side application we are looking for. Rather a server side application. Which would be run on a Apache Server, utilizing PHP, and a MySQL database.

This would be a web-based client extranet.

I've not used it myself, but everyone seems to recomend [Basecamp](http://web.archive.org/web/20110625050540/http:/www.basecamphq.com/index.php).

I've not managed to find a usable open-source one.

Ed.
I will check that one out.
It seems to be much more project management, than a client extranet. All we really need is a extranet proofing application.. preferably one we can tweak code on. Suggestions?

This is a good site, but it seems to be broken right now:

[www.opensourcecms.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20110625050540/http:/www.opensourcecms.com/ "www.opensourcecms.com/")

It listed heaps of open source content management systems and let you preview them all. It rated them too.

Not as open source, but a huge list:

[http://www.cmsmatrix.org/](http://web.archive.org/web/20110625050540/http:/www.cmsmatrix.org/ "http://www.cmsmatrix.org/")

Good luck
